outperformed: all the strong state of - the - art models

outperformed.from sentence: We observe that our model outperformed all the strong state of - the - art models on both datasets in all metrics except for RG - 2 on Gigaword .

In terms of.from sentence: In terms of the pointer generator performance , the improvements made by our concept pointer are statistically significant ( p < 0.01 ) across all metrics .
